start.text: Heh... how insignificant their wretched fleet is. This shall be a fun distraction...
Ahh. Look upon this measly collection of pathetic vermin. They shall taste my fury...
It's time to conduct evil... let's make it a slaughter party.
Mm hm hm hm. This shall be a glorious flesh-feast.

out_of_missiles.text: Missiles depleted... but my power is only beginning to be unleashed!

engaged.text: The filth has rounded on me in the battlespace. Time to unleash my true power.
Ha ha ha! Yes! I am a GOD!!!
Quake and shiver as you feel the extent of my terrible power!

need_help.text: Join me! JOIN ME in battle, and we shall drown the stars in a deluge of boiling ichor!
Ahh, that's better, worm! Yes, FEED my boundless anger!

pursuing.text: What's the problem, worm? Starting to doubt your convictions? I can't blame you...
Sate my hunger, you disgusting wretch!

hull_90.text: Ha ha ha ha! Good, good! Feed my fury, slake my thirst!
Huurgh! Yes, that's better! Ha ha ha ha haa!!!

hull_50.text: YOU SHALL BE SEARED BY MY INCOMPREHENSIBLE MIGHT!
Hmpf... I may have to use -that-.

hull_30.text: HA HA HA HA HA HA HA!!!!

overload.text: Hrrnn!!! Get the reactor in check, you disgusting grunts!

victory.text: HAAA HA HA HA HA HA! TRULY pathetic!
Hm hm hm hm. Let this be a lesson to you all.
A predictable outcome... Hm hm hm.

victory_boss.text: You were in contempt of my power... now a cursory glance reveals the extent of your ruin.
